info.title: Track Health
info.description: This is an API Rest maked in NodeJs...

get.description: Search all alergies registers on table allergies.
Search all alergies registers by the user.

post.description: Add a new allergy to user or create a new allergy. The fileds 'id' is optional when you want to create a new allergy. The field description is optional in any cases.

value.name: Camarão
value.description: Alergia a camarão detalhada, caso necessário.

value.name: Camarão
value.description: Alergia a camarão detalhada, caso necessário.

patch.description: Update a user allergy description by id sended to route params.

delete.description: Delete a user allergy by id sended to route params.

get.description: Search all medications registers on table medications.
Search all medications registers by the user.

post.description: Add a new medication to user or create a new medication. The fileds 'id' is optional when you want to create a new medication. The field description is optional in any cases.

patch.description: Update a user medication description by id sended to route params.

delete.description: Delete a user medication by id sended to route params.

post.description: Create a new anamnesis to user.

get.description: Search all diseases registers on table diseases.

delete.description: Delete a disease by id sended by route params.

get.description: Search all diseases registers by the user.

post.description: Add a new disease to user. If the disease don't exist create a new one and add to user. You only need to give the name of the disease, description and medication are optional.

patch.description: Update a user disease description and/or medication by id sended to route params.

delete.description: Delete a user disease by id sended to route params.

get.description: Search all address registers on table address.

delete.description: Delete a address by id sended by route params.
